segments.text: Peeking into the kitchen, I see the woman focused on drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is on, and the sink is flooding over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How irresponsible to leave it running like that!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is damaging everything it touches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is wet, and she just stands there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, climbing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is unstable; the boy could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate while grabbing cookiesâ€”dangerous combo.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, hand up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is neat and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I get why the kids are tempted; cookies are the best.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the adult should be watching them, not the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
